text:
Yo beta yo! Tm jyada na socho! Bas aese hi tm rho!

Yo Apoorva! Most chilled girl of IITK ka khitaab tmhe hi milna chahiye. Apni journey foyer s foyer tk hi rh gyi(sadly). Mile v appan first year drameve2 m hi the. Tune starting s hi fumble fumble bolke end m kr hi diya üòÇ Orientation m tune bacha wale role k liye effort to acha maara tha but niyati(urf kunal) ko kch aur hi manjoor tha. Phir summer k mze to alag level p the. Aaj s teri sari galiyan meri ho gyiii..‚ù§Ô∏è teri aur shrotriya ki constant bakchodiyan yaad rhega. Kvi khin milna to apni kahani v sunayenge, ab to nayi v bn chuki hüòä
Tb tk aese hi khush raho, mze kro , muskuraate rho. Alvida‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Kitni % chance h ki ek banda ek school m 10th tk pdhta, dusra bnda same school m 11-12 krta, aur phir dono unknowingly same exam dete(jee), dono same iit aate aur usme v same club m aake kaam krte. Itni coincidence agar kisi bandi k saath hoti to mai ise bhagwaan ka ishaara maan leta. But ..chill h.

Kabhi saath m chlte h bhagwanpur alumni bnke, bhaukaal macha denge üî•

Tb tk duaaon m yaad rkhna, bnaras apna sheher h, aate h to milnge. Tb tk k liye ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Hm first year m aaye the drameve2 m to sab daily bolte the, nana kyu nhi aa ra, kb aayega vgerah. Phle to ye nana wali story pta nhj thi, phir Nukkad dkha to smjh aaya. 

Drams + dance ‚ù§Ô∏è bhai tmse bakchod bnda IITK m dusra shayad hi hoga. 

Apne kch chutiyapon k karan jyada mil nhi paaye foyer k baad. but chill h, chhoti si duniya h khin na khin kisi n kisi kone m mil hi jayenge. Bas bhul mt jaana!!

By: dassa
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Khemraj urf khemu

Kya god aadmi h bhai tu. Hmesha itna shaant shaant sa rhta tha tu, aur bolta v to itne dheere s ki bas geetam ko hi sunayi de. But jab v bolta kya alag level chaapta. Tera wo iconic dialogue jab shailabh pizza khaate tym aaya tha tere room p, *Darwaaza udhar h*, bhaiii üî•üî• Ultimate level swag. Silent killer. Dkhte dkhte itne sare apps host krwa liye playstore p. Aero + development god.indian whatsapp bna bhai, zuck ki maa tu hi chod skta h. Last month aana chahiye tha, aur maze hote. But chill h, khin n khin to mil hi jayenge. Tb tk k liye bye bye!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text: Hey bro!! Honestly u have one of the most inspiring stories of IITK. Kaafi mehnat kra h bhai tune and so completely deserved everything you achieved. First semester SPI and last semester SPI tells everything. Ab to UPSC nikaalne k baad hi miloge shayad, all the best for that. Aur haan wo bazooka wali treat k liye thanks, aur v bht sari bachi h. Milna kvi, sab ek baar m hi lenge. Till then, keep smiling!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Real life Rancho of IITK ‚ù§Ô∏è Dassa, Violinist, reader, writer, athlete..... One man army h bhai tu toh. Ab to poori ki poori novel v publish hone ja rahi. 

Aesi bht kch baatein likh skta, but tune hi ek baar bola tha agar mai v baakiyon ki trah chaapu aur god bolu to tu mere room p nhi aayega phir. So aaj kch naya sunata hu. Itne chutiyap kiye tune College m, kyu bhai

Acads, har sem SPI 10, kya fayada hua iska? Bas life m thodi success mil jaayegi, kch m(b)illions aa jayenge, bas? CPI vs semesters ka plot bna, ek straight line. Itni simple equation , y = 10. Slope v 0 bc. Bhai ek baar try krta meri trah 7 laane ka. Kya adventurous academic life hoti. Meri dkh cpi vs semesters ki itni complex equation bn rhi, nikaal v nhi paaya. U missed it bro!

Punctuality , bhai yr, har kaam time p. Sare assignments deadlines s phle complete. No fun. Meri stories dkh(Reference OS assignment)- 12 bje deadline h, 11:50 p code compile kra without any errors, 1st run m hi correct output (tera bhai v thoda talented h), 11:55 p dabba power off ho gya bc, 12:03 p submit kra, phir deba ko mail , assignment accepted. Aesi kitne examples h. Procrastination k v apne mze hote h. Kaash tu ye sab kr paata!

Dedication- Again the same thing. Hmesha kch na kch krne ki chull rhti tujhe. One of the highest paying companies m PPO liya, uske baad v tujhe shaanti nhi mili. Palantir ka naam v nhi suna tha maine toh. Usme v internship final hi thi bas ye covid nhi hota. Entrepreneurship m v peeche nhi hi h tu. Kisi din linkedin p post krega, i am starting a new company (Ye seriously kr bro, mai shares kharidne k liye paise jama kr ra). Kya krega itna krke bhai, sab mohmaya h. Kvi kch unproductive kaam v try to kr jaise fan ko ghumte hue dekhna, random useless videos dkhna etc. Mai formal course v kra dunga. Time_Waste_101. Jab v mn ho ek email drop kr diyo, bhai h tu apna, free m krwaunga!

Aur v bht saari baatein h waise toh, but sab kch likhunga to depression m chla jaayega. Isiliye chhor deta hu. Lkin jyada pareshan hone ki baat nhi h, touch m rhiyo, dheere dheere sab thk ho jaayega.

Kch ache kaam v kiye h waise tune, to uska credit v bnta h. Jaise first year m dramatics join Krna, tujhe hi dkh k mai v chla gya tha! OS k assignment m help krne k liye shukriya(wo vfork, cfork to hota hi nhi mere s). CS202 m tune mujhe 3-4 baar bola code krne ko, end m khud hi aa gya tha room p saath m krne!  Aur v bht baar help kri h. Last ek month m mze v bht kre saath m. Holi, Uno, bluff , late night campus tour, sab yaad rhega!

Baaki chill h, mze Krna life m jhaaan v rho. Tune bola tha kisi v country m jao, india wapas aayega. Yaad rkhna. Mai idhar hi khin mil jaunga, kch na kch krte. Bas accent indian hi rkhiyo yr, ye 2 saal bahar rhkar jo British aur American accent m bolne lgte h chutiye lgte h!

Avi k liye itna hi! 

Signing off!
Tera chaapu bhai,
Shivam!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Yo bro!! Chronologically chlte h

Sabse pahle to tere baare m shailabh ya Aditya s suna tha , ek chaapu banda h batti ka. tera naam v aesa unique tha *Sgdz*, meko lga kisi anime character s derived h. Mulakaat ache s to 4 mid m hi hui. Us samay pta chla tu gamer god v h. Aditya har 2 din p haarta tere s phir bt sunata na pdhai ho rahi na game khelta ache s. Phir tere political vichaaron k bare m pta chla. Again Aditya n hi teri aur meri first aur last debate krwayi thi mere hi room p, topic obviously hmare sabke priye modi ji. Usi tym mai smjh gya tha koi fayada nhi tere s debate krne kaüò∂ Memegod, Anime lover, bht sare talents bhar rkhe h tune! Ab to maine v AoT start kr diya, all credits to u ‚ù§Ô∏è End m tu v shailabh ki trah *khin nhi ho ra* ka randirona krke Apple maar liya. God level playüî• join krne k baad iPhone aur Mac courier kr dena, address Mai dm kr dunga. Last ek month m kri hui bakchodiyan to hmesha yaad hi rhegi. Inhi k chakkar m tune apni ungli aur kamar v kurbaan kr diye, hats off! Bas ek hi gam h, wo raat jab appan 2 baje tak piye, tujhe join Krna chahiye tha dance crew ko. But chill h, milte h kvi, wapas recreate krenge scne ko!

Aur haan tere murder ka plan bna liya h maine, Et tu Brutus wali line yaad kr liyo ache s

Har har modi, ghar ghar modi!.
Modi h to mumkin h!
Modi is a necessary evil!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Hi keshav! I can undoubtedly say you are one of the most intelligent yet most humblest guy of our department. Initially, I used to think twice before asking you a question since it might be too stupid for you, but the way you used to answer each and every question of mine made me quite comfortable. Really thanks for that!  So many times I used to get bored in kd sitting n completing our assignments, but a look of you engrossed in ur lap used to fill me with all the inspiration I needed. Specifically in OS, thanks a lot for helping in the assignments. Tbh those should have been termed as class assignment instead of individual ones xd. As far as the acads r concerned, I don't think I  need to say anything. The world knows this already. Your dedication towards work is unparalleled and this will definitely make you achieve all goals n heights of your life. All the best for your future, keep rising and inspiring others. If possible I would love to meet sometime in future, or what about organizing the reunion in kd? That would definitely be amazing. 
Till then Byeee!!!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text: Campus guide to trading school, kch months m hi kaafi achi journey bna di bhai tune. Jidhar v chle jao, tu mil hi jaata tha. Omnipresent. These last 2 months couldn't be this fun without u. Us raat jab appan 2 baje tk piye, doston k liye tune bndi k promise ko thukra diya, respect üôè. jaate jaate v chaap hi diya tune(Reference - yhi h tumhari loyalty üôÇ) Keep it up bro, milte h khin na khin.  Tb tk k liye Alvida!!!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Yo KG bro, apna wing entertainer.

First year m to apni baat nhi hui thi jyada, bas Aditya bolta tha ek h KG, shibalik bht maarta h uski(mai nhi, AdityaüôÇ). Jab appan 4-mid m shift hue to meko pta chla Durgesh tere saath rh ra. Mujhe lga ab tu v routined ho jayega uske trah but bc tu to geetam aur khemraj k saath threesome krne chla gya!

Jo v ho bnda mast h yr tu! 2 bje har din canteen hmesha yaad rhega! Shailabh aur teri legendary chappal fight (OAT road wali) miss kr di maine!

Real bakchodi to last ek month m hui. Wing holi  aur tere room p wo dance‚ù§Ô∏è avi tak ka bestest tha. Tera iconic step bhaiii(along with expressions)üî•üî• Raat ka campus tour.   Jaate jaate sari *illegal* cheezein v try kr hi liüòÇ

Tu campus s kya gya, college n poora campus hi khaali krwa diyaüî•

Baaki chill h, milenge jarur, khin na khin! Tb tk k liye alvida!

author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text: Hi nitish!! U r one of the most hardworking and inspiring guy I have yet came across. The dedication for acads, hall feeling, extra curricular, u have all of it. We couldn't catch up much after first year, but i would definitely want to be in touch. I wish you achieve all the heights u want in ur life. All the best for future!
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Ostwald sir! Coordi bnke tm Friedrich Wilhelm Ostwald ka naam roshan kr diye!

Sabse phle hmari mulakaat first year drameve2 m hi hui thi! Aese to galaxy m hi milna chahiye tha, but us tym *I was kinda busy exploring other opportunities (in British accent)*. Kismat bht madarchod cheez hoti h. Kya kr skte h

Kedia k favorite go to guy for sutta tm hi the(along with dindor). Play m production team k manager. Drameve 1 k baad wapas antaragni m tm as mime director mil hi gye! Kaash aur time continue kr paate lkin kismat bht madarchod cheez hoti h.kya kr skte h

Aur wo hall 12 wali dp isiliye kyuki *Hall 3 is not a place, it's a people* hm jhaan rhte h, whin hall 3 bn jaata h‚ù§Ô∏è aur haan hme kholne k liye dhanyawad

Baaki duaaon m yaad rkhna. Khin kisi raaste p mil gye to chehra pahchaan lena, bht bt h sunane ko!

‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ

author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Hey bro! As most of my assignment deadlines, ye kaam v last min p kr ra hu, don't mind!

Honestly speaking, starting m I didn't know your full name, bas sab varshney varshney khte the to whi yaad tha, baad m student search p jaake check kiya xd! Apni best interaction to last semester m hi hui, thanks to my habit of being the silent one in our department. And ngl, agar tm nhi hote to mai akele to bilkul hi submit nhi kr paata ek v assignment time p. Last moment p code successfully execute krke submit krne ka fun hi alag hüòÇ tho uske chakkar m apna dinner chhut gya n same day campus ki sari shops closed, kya coincidence tha bc. But in the end, it was really great working with you yr. Thanks for it. Will definitely love to be in touch and meet again! Till then 
‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Thanks!
-- from Microsoft EdgeüôÇ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Hey bro! Although appan same state, same department k the, but still kaafi less interaction hua starting m , thanks to me being engrossed somewhere, pta ni khaan(acads nhi bc). Jab same wing m aaye tb jaake better jaana tujhe. Gpl m kya shiddat s maarta tha yr tu, sabse jyada awaz teri chappal ki hi aati thi üòÇ

Phir last months ki bakchodiyan to lifelong yaad rahegi. Nightout, bluff, Uno, campus tours, treat sab kch. Wo raat bhar dance wala v alag mahaul tha. Kg s teri chhoti moti ldaaiyan to hui aese hi but sabse jyada miss v tune hi kra uske jane k baadüòÇ

Aur apna saath m cnb to muz 700 km ki trip to definitely one of the longest rod trips m s hone wali meri. And plus wo key car m chhorke lock kr dene wala kaand...bhai meri to fat gyi thi..but wo driver n Sambhal liya. Aese chill h, yhi baatein baad m yaad aati h‚ù§Ô∏è

Aage v milna, aese hi bakchodiyan krenge. Tb tk k liye 
‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Yo dindor! Drams club k shayar. Meko utni to knowledge nhi shayari vgerah ki lkin jab v idhar udhar kch dikhta h tmhara, dard hi dard dikhta! 

Ganga barrage ki wo trip to yaad hi hogi, girish aur nana k saath dance. Best video h apna wo!

Drameve 2 s drameve1 tk kaafi bakchodiyan kri! Summers m to bhai kya mze hue, dance classes‚ù§Ô∏è bhale hi ghnta kch seeekha ho but stilll best tha. Summer play m hi to non cast members ki importance ka pta chla.

Baaki chill h, milnge khin na khin, kisi n kisi mod p! Tb tk k liye ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Hey bro!! I first remember you when someone mentioned you being a dassa. Then I noticed you, and ur studious innocent face did make me believe, you r one. Honestly speaking, you have one of the most beautiful n innocent smile which can make anyone's day good. Although apna department vgerah to sab same hi tha, still unfortunately we couldn't spend much time together.

And then...

The night came. When real Rohan came from inside xd.(u know which one üòÇ)Bhai it was literally epic and couldn't be that fun without you. U were the only one jisne full enjoy kra, wrna baaki to kisi ko kch khaas hua hi nhi. I wish appan phle ye sab kre hote to aur v kaafi Stories bn gayi hoti. Next day ravi k phn s delete krne k liye tune itna bola, aur end m krwa hi liyaüòÇ 

Ab to appan same company m v h(don't know kab tküòÇ) , goals v similar hi h, so hopefully khin n khin mil hi jayenge, jo v kch bach gya wo tb poora kr lnge. Tb tk k liye 
‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Yo shailabh! Muzaffarpur ka naam roshan krne wale veer(aage v kroge ik). Bhale hi sabhi log kitne v mze le le, sab bear kr leta h tu, except a few fights with kg, but wo jruri v thi wrna wing meets boring ho jaati. Wo chappal war OAT road wali miss kr di thi maine, but hopefully aage v mauke dega tu. Kch baar to mujhe v nhi chhora tha tune. Wo campus s wapas aane wala incident yaad hoga tujhe, mai tera room p wait kr ra tha saath m chlne ko, aur tu sir k paas 1 number bdha rha tha, end m mujhe akele hi nikalna pda but phir tu raaste m hi mil gya. Thoda sunaya tha us din, but hopefully tune dil p nhi liya hoga. 

Chaapne m to tu gawd h hi, duniya jaanti h. Tere to *chillax* krne ka tarika v unique h. Also jugaad krne m tera to koi mukaabla hi nhi kr skta. Har problem ka solution nikaal hi leta h tu. But seriously speaking, all this hard work will definitely payoff one day, if few papers here n there ain't enough.

Aur haan wo Maine mze m hi bola tha tu wapas ab kbhi nhi milega, aa jana bc wrna ghar p phuch jaayenge sab log. Tere bina apni wing poori kaise ho skti h. 

Aese hi chaapte rho, mze krte rho, krwaate rho. Hmaari duaaein tmhare saath h ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞. 

‡§Ö‡§≤‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡§æ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)

text:
Yo bro! My first memory of you is sitting in kd with keshav, and doing some or other work. I have always thought of you as hard working humble guy who would go to any limit for his goals. And that definitely did yielded off, congratulations once again for Oxford. 

Apart from all this hard work, you r so down to earth yr, I really really admire you for this. You would never seem to accept how chaapu you are, but now I don't think so anyone needs explanation. 

Apart from all this, thanks a lot for all the assignments/exam preparation we did together in kd. I hope sometime we could meet again in future and remember in a chilly night all these memories, it would be beautiful. Till then, keep succeeding, keep rising, keep smiling ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Shivam Kumar (B P Singh)
